title: Не забудьте выключить телевизор
overview: Masha Borzunova exposes propaganda fakes now on Votvot!The former host of the Fake News program on the Dozhd TV channel and one of the most fearless journalists analyzes Russian propaganda every week and takes it apart piece by piece. What they say (or don't say) on television, how the "official" media manipulate us and what exactly they want to instill - we find out, delve into it, and defend ourselves.
